title: # 435 - Eric Andre & ME
description:
Today I sit down with actor/comedian Eric Andre. We talk about The Eric Andre Show, taking criticism, his music background, doing mushrooms, Hannibal Buress, OCD, and much more!  

Season 5 of “The Eric Andre Show” premieres Oct 25th on Adult Swim!

This episode is brought to you by Benebone. Go to http://www.chewy.com and use promo code "Bert" for 30% off your first order.

This episode is brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bert” at checkout to save 15%. 

This episode is also brought to you by Buffalo Trace Whiskey. Go to http://www.Buffalotrace.com to order yours today.

This episode is also brought to you by Mint Mobile. Cut your unlimited wireless bill to $30 a month at http://www.mintmobile.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code "Bert" at checkout. 

This episode is also brought to you by Kusy Dreams CBD. Go to http://www.KushyDreams.com and use the Promo Code “BERT” for 20% off your order. 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer
